comments:
Created an attachment (id=84474)
Tomcat stdout log excerpt around OutOfMemoryError

Happens with 12/3 build.
The Bridge returned OutOfMemoryError while processing a response from http://129.6.24.109:9080/axis2/services/xdsregistrya against the query below.

<query:AdhocQueryRequest xmlns:query="urn:oasis:names:tc:ebxml-regrep:query:xsd:2.1"><query:ResponseOption returnComposedObjects="true" returnType="LeafClass" /><query:SQLQuery>SELECT doc.id FROM ExtrinsicObject doc, ExternalIdentifier patId WHERE doc.objectType = 'urn:uuid:7edca82f-054d-47f2-a032-9b2a5b5186c1' AND (patId.registryObject = doc.id AND patId.identificationScheme = 'urn:uuid:58a6f841-87b3-4a3e-92fd-a8ffeff98427' AND patId.value = ('428db2e57eaf4aa^^^&1.3.6.1.4.1.21367.2005.3.7&ISO')) AND (doc.status IN ('Approved', 'Deprecated')) </query:SQLQuery></query:AdhocQueryRequest>

The attached file is Tomcat log excerpt, including stack trace to the OutOfMemoryException which follows below for your convenience.

This is definitely a bug.  Will work on it.
